name: The Unknowns: Strange Fish from Familiar Waters
name_original: The Unknowns: Strange Fish from Familiar Waters
description:
CONTENT WARNING: Profanity, drugs and alcohol. In future updates: Violence, murder.

Five friends go camping by a lake. Get to know them better before it's too late.

This Visual Novel was made for the Spooktober 2022 GameJam, but I couldn't finish all 9 chapters in time so here's the 1st one. Consider it a brief prologue. The other 8 chapters will be coming soon, with at least a few of them in October.

FEATURES:

  • Fully voiced Visual Novel
  • 3D, lowpoly look
  • Impactful choices
  • Original soundtrack

CREDITS:

Writing, Sound Design, Music & Development by Leon Artmann

VOICE CAST:

Mandy - Vera Tan

Alex - David Oliveira Franklin

George - Jett Barker

Lucy - Meredith Nudo

Bobby - Walter Mack
